```{r data, include = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
## • (updated 2021/11/16 09:02) create diag_ba.dat refids -----------------
# refids diag all, bland-altman, mean diff, snsp

  pull(refid) %>%

diag_ba_refids <- contin.dat %>%

  filter_at(vars(ba1_ind_thresh:ba1_pval), any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>% 
  pull(refid) %>% 
  unique()

diag_mn_refids <- contin.dat %>% 
  filter(str_detect(study_arm_k, "diag_acc")) %>% 
  filter_at(vars(tofr8_mean:tofr_fade_md_pval), any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>% 
  pull(refid) %>% 
  unique()

diag_snsp_refids <- contin.dat %>% 
  filter(str_detect(study_arm_k, "diag_acc")) %>% 
  filter_at(vars(sens_ind_thresh:npv2_iqr_u), any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>% 
  pull(refid) %>% 
  unique()

study_arm_ba.dat <- study_arm.dat %>% 
  filter(refid %in% diag_ba_refids)

study_char_ba.dat <- study_char.dat %>% 
  filter(refid %in% diag_ba_refids)   

# study arm data to add (preload)
study_arm_add <- study_arm_ba.dat %>% 
  select(refid, arm_id, mon_preload)

## (updated 2021/11/19 19:39) diag_ba.dat ---------------------------------
diag_ba.dat <- contin.dat %>%
  filter(refid %in% diag_ba_refids) %>%
  mutate(
    subgroup = replace_na(subgroup, "none"),
    subgroup_up = ifelse(subgroup == "none", "", paste0("_", subgroup)),
    arm = paste0("diag_acc", subgroup_up),
    mon_name = ifelse(mon_name == "Other Brand", mon_brand_oth, mon_name)
  ) %>%
  rename(ind_test = arm_diag_acc, ref_test = ba1_ref) %>%
  select(-author) %>%
  # add preload from study_arm.dat
  left_join(study_arm_add, by = c("refid", "arm_id")) %>%
  relocate(mon_preload, .after = mon_type) %>%
  # add monitor brand for referent
  mutate(
    mon_arm1 = case_when(
      # arm 2 or 3 referent in arm 1
      arm_id == 2 ~ lag(mon_name),
      arm_id == 3 ~ lag(mon_name, n = 2),
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ),
    mon_arm2 = case_when(
      arm_id == 3 ~ lag(mon_name, n = 1),
      arm_id == 1 ~ lead(mon_name),
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ),
    # add preload by arm
    mon_preload1 = case_when(
      # arm 2 or 3 referent in arm 1
      arm_id == 2 ~ lag(mon_preload),
      arm_id == 3 ~ lag(mon_preload, n = 2),
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ),
    mon_preload2 = case_when(
      arm_id == 3 ~ lag(mon_preload, n = 1),
      arm_id == 1 ~ lead(mon_preload),
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ),
    # # add normalized by arm
    # mon_norm_ind = case_when(
    #   # arm 2 or 3 referent in arm 1
    #   arm_id == 1 ~ ba_ind1_norm),
    #   arm_id == 3 ~ lag(mon_norm, n = 2),
    #   TRUE ~ NA_character_
    # ),
    # mon_norm2 = case_when(
    #   arm_id == 3 ~ lag(mon_norm, n = 1),
    #   arm_id == 1 ~ lead(mon_norm),
    #   TRUE ~ NA_character_
    # ),
    across(contains("preload"), ~ str_replace(.x, "preload_", ""))
  ) %>% 
  # select(refid, study, arm_id, starts_with("mon")) %>%
  # filter(refid == 2844) %>% 
  # filter_at(vars(ba1_ind_thresh:ba1_pval), any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>%
  # remove_empty(which = "cols") %>%
  # single variable for referent brand (2 arm studies)
  mutate(
    ref_mon = NA_character_,
    ref_mon = ifelse(arm_id == 2, mon_arm1, ref_mon),
    ref_mon = ifelse(arm_id == 1, mon_arm2, ref_mon),
    ref_mon = ifelse(ref_test == "mmg", "MMG", ref_mon),
    ref_preload = NA_character_,
    ref_preload = ifelse(arm_id == 2, mon_preload1, ref_preload),
    ref_preload = ifelse(arm_id == 1, mon_preload2, ref_preload)
  ) %>% 
  rename(ind_mon = mon_name, ind_preload = mon_preload) %>% 
  select(refid, study, arm_id, year, design, age, arm, arm_n, subgroup, subgroup_up, ind_test, ind_mon, ref_test, ref_mon, ends_with("norm"), starts_with("mon"), contains("time_from"),  starts_with("ba"), bland_altman, everything()) %>% 
  arrange(ind_test, ref_test) 
  # select(refid, study, arm_id, ind_mon, ind_preload, ref_mon, ref_preload, contains("mon"), contains("preload"))

write_csv(diag_ba.dat, file = "/Users/mgrant/Desktop/diag_ba.csv", na = "")

temp <- diag_mn.dat %>% 
  select(starts_with("tofr8_")) %>% 
  rename_at(vars(contains("95")), ~ str_replace(., "95", "ci_95")) %>% 
  rename_at(vars(starts_with("tofr8_")), ~ str_replace(., "tofr8_", "")) %>% 
  mutate(
    sd = ifelse(is.na(sd) & !is.na(ci_95_l + ci_95_u), round_1((ci_95_u - ci_95_l)/(1.96*4)), sd),
    mean_sd = paste0(mean, " (", sd, ")"),
    med_iqr_lu = case_when(
      !is.na(med) & !is.na(iqr_l + iqr_u) ~ paste0(med,  " (", iqr_l, "-", iqr_u, ")"),
      !is.na(med) & !is.na(low + up) ~ paste0(med,  " {", low, "-", up, "}"),
      !is.na(med) ~ as.character(med),
      is.na(med) & !is.na(low + up) ~ paste0("{", low, "-", up, "}"),
      is.na(med) & !is.na(iqr_l + iqr_u) ~ paste0("(", iqr_l, "-", iqr_u, ")"),
      TRUE ~ NA_character_),
    mean_sd = str_replace(mean_sd, "NA \\(NA\\)", ""),
    # med_iqr_lu = str_replace(med_iqr_lu, "NA (NA)", ""),
  )
```

# **Included Studies** 

<br/>

<font size = 4> Table `r table_n`. Number of included studies according to age and design. </font>

```{r tablesIncluded, include = TRUE, echo = FALSE} 
## • (updated 2021/11/13 07:21) study_char_diag.dat -----------------------
# list of studies, age, surgical/non surgical, design 
study_char.dat %>% 
  filter(refid %in% diag_refids) %>% 
  group_by(age, design, .groups = "drop") %>%
  summarise(total = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(age, design) %>%
  group_by(age, .groups = "drop") %>%
  mutate(row = row_number()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  janitor::adorn_totals("row") %>%
  mutate(
    age = ifelse(row != 1, NA, age),
    design = case_when(
      design == "rct" ~ "RCT",
      design == "crossover" ~ "Crossover",
      design == "cluster" ~ "Cluster",
      design == "nrsi" ~ "Nonrandomized",
      design == "prospect_coh" ~ "Prospective Cohort",
      design == "retrospect_coh" ~ "Retrospective Cohort",
      design == "casecontrol" ~ "Case-Control",
      design == "other" ~ "Before-After",
      design == "fully_paired" ~ "Fully Paired"),
      age = ifelse(row_number() == n(), "Total", age)
  ) %>%
  select(age, design, total) %>%
  kbl(
    booktabs = T, align = c("llr"),
    col.names = c("Age", "Design", "N")
  ) %>%
  row_spec(c(0, 7), bold = TRUE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = opt_boot, position = "left") %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = FALSE, html_font = opt_font, position = "left", "hover") %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "8em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "3em") %>% 
  footnote(
    general = "RCT: randomized controlled trial.",
    # alphabet = c("Footnote a", "Footnote b", ...),
    general_title = "",
    footnote_as_chunk = FALSE
  )

table_n <- tab_inc()
```

```{r studiesIncludedList, echo = FALSE, include = TRUE}
## • (updated 2021/11/16 09:06) included_studies.dat ----------------------
included_studies.dat <- study_char.dat %>%
  filter(refid %in% diag_refids) %>%
  # filter(refid == 2703)
  mutate(
    design_l = as.character(design),
    design_l = factor(design_l,
      levels = c("rct", "fully_paired", "nrsi", "prospect_coh", "retrospect_coh"),
      labels = c("RCT", "Fully paired", "NRSI", "Prospective Cohort", "Retrospective Cohort")
    ),
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ str_replace(.x, "surg_", "")),
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ str_c(.x, ", ")),
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ firstup(.x)),
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ replace_na(.x, "")),
    surg_list = ifelse(grepl("abdom", surg_list), "Abdominal, ", ""),
    surgs = str_c(surg_various, surg_car, surg_cr, surg_gyn, surg_gi, surg_gen, surg_headneck, surg_hep, surg_neuro, surg_opth, surg_oralmax, surg_ortho, surg_otolar, surg_plastic, surg_thor, surg_urol, surg_list),
    surgs = str_replace(surgs, "Otolar", "ENT"),
    surgs = str_replace(surgs, "Headneck", "ENT"),
    surgs = str_sub(surgs, 1, nchar(surgs) - 2),
    country = ifelse(grepl("USA", country), "USA", country),
    country = ifelse(grepl("UK", country), "UK", country),
    country = ifelse(!is.na(non_vh_hdi), str_c(country, "^a^"), country),
    # design = case_when(
    #   design == "rct" ~ "RCT",
    #   design == "fully_paired" ~ "Fully paired"
    # ),
    # design = ifelse(study == "Claudius 2009", "Fully paired (random subset)", design)
  ) %>%
  select(refid, study_l, year, age, design, design_l, n_analyze, country, centers, non_vh_hdi, surgs) %>%
  arrange(age, design_l, year)
```

## *Agreement*

<br/>

```{r blandAltmanData, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
## • (updated 2021/11/14 09:21) data --------------------------------------
temp1 <- diag_ba.dat %>% 
  select(-c(ba2_ind_thresh:ba2_pval)) %>% 
  mutate(comparison = "ba1")

temp2 <- diag_ba.dat %>% 
  filter(!is.na(ba2_ind_thresh)) %>% 
  select(-c(ba1_ind_thresh:ba1_pval)) %>%
  rename_at(vars(starts_with("ba2")), ~ str_replace(.,  "ba2", "ba1")) %>% 
  mutate(ba1_pval = as.character(ba1_pval)) %>% # to allow bind_rows
  select(-ba1_ref) %>% # same as ref_test; may later need to verify for add refids)
  mutate(comparison = "ba2")

bland_altman.dat <- bind_rows(temp1, temp2) %>%
  mutate(design = case_when(
    study == "Claudius 2009" ~ "Fully paired (random subset)",
    design == "fully_paired" ~ "Fully paired"),
    ind_norm =  NA_character_,
    ref_norm =  NA_character_,
    ind_norm = ifelse(comparison == "ba1", ba_ind1_norm, ind_norm),
    ref_norm = ifelse(comparison == "ba1", ba_ref1_norm, ref_norm),
    ind_norm = ifelse(comparison == "ba2", ba_ind2_norm, ind_norm),
    ref_norm =  ifelse(comparison == "ba2", ba_ref2_norm, ref_norm),
  ) %>%
  remove_empty(which = "cols") %>% 
  rename_at(vars(starts_with("ba1")), ~ str_replace(., "ba1", "ba")) 

write_csv(bland_altman.dat, file = "/Users/mgrant/Desktop/bland_altman.csv", na = "")

rm(temp1, temp2)

## • (updated 2021/11/16 09:14) table -------------------------------------
bland_altman_kbl <- bland_altman.dat %>%
  filter_at(vars(ba_bias:ba_loa_u_95_u), any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>%
  mutate(
    ba_loa_u = round(ba_loa_u, digits = 2),
    ba_loa_l = round(ba_loa_l, digits = 2),
    # ba_loa_l = ifelse(is.na(ba_loa_l) & !is.na(ba_loa_sd), formatC(ba_bias - 1.96 * ba_loa_sd, digits = 2), ba_loa_l),
    ba_loa_l = ifelse(is.na(ba_loa_l) & !is.na(ba_loa_sd), round(ba_bias - 1.96 * ba_loa_sd, 2), ba_loa_l),
    ba_loa_u = ifelse(is.na(ba_loa_u) & !is.na(ba_loa_sd), round(ba_bias + 1.96 * ba_loa_sd, 2), ba_loa_u),
    # ba_loa_u = format(ba_loa_u, digits = 2),
    ba_result = paste0(ba_bias, " (", ba_bias_95_l, " to ", ba_bias_95_u, ")"),
    # Capron 2006, 1864 % NEED TO FIX OTHERS LATER EG BOWDLE
    ba_result = ifelse(refid == 1864, paste0(ba_bias, "%", " (", ba_bias_95_l, "%",  " to ", ba_bias_95_u, "%", ")"), ba_result), 
    ba_loa = paste0("(", ba_loa_l, " to ", ba_loa_u, ")"),
    ba_result = str_replace(ba_result, "\\(NA to NA\\)", ""),
    ba_result = str_replace(ba_result, "(\\d+) $", "\\1"),
    ba_result = str_replace(ba_result, "NA", ""),
    ba_loa = str_replace(ba_loa, "\\(NA to NA\\)", " "),
    time_at = ifelse(str_detect(ba_ind_thresh, "at|pacu|all"), "at", "time"), # at a specfic TOFR or time to
    ba_result = ifelse(!str_detect(ba_result, "^-"), paste0("  ", ba_result), ba_result),
    time_from = ifelse(time_from_other %in% "TOFR 0.2", "tofr_0.2", time_from),
    time_from = factor(time_from,
      levels = c("endsurg", "nmba_admin", "notgiven", "reverse_admin", "tofc0", "tofc2", "tofr_0.2"),
      labels = c("End surg", "NMB admin", "Not stated", "Reversal admin", "TOFC 0", "TOFC 2", "TOFR 0.2")),
    # fix Claudius 2009 MMG, Bowdle 2020 MMG preload
    ref_preload = ifelse(refid %in% c(2120, 3392), "yes", ref_preload),
    # fix Capron 2006 MMG 
    ref_preload = ifelse(refid %in% c(1864), "ns", ref_preload)
  ) %>%
  arrange(age, ind_test, study, time_at, ba_ind_thresh, time_from, year) %>%
  select(age, refid, study, arm_id, design, year, arm_n, ind_test, ind_mon, ind_preload, ind_norm, ref_test, ref_mon, ref_preload, ref_norm, time_at, ba_ind_thresh, ba_ref_thresh, time_from, time_from_other, ba_result, ba_loa)
```

<font size = 4> Table `r table_n`. Characteristics of monitors in studies reporting agreement (Bland-Altman) at specific TOFRs. </font>

```{r blandAltmanKbl, include = TRUE, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
## (updated 2021/11/18 09:41) at specified TOFR ---------------------------
bland_altman_kbl_at <- bland_altman_kbl %>%
  filter(time_at == "at") %>%
  mutate(ba_result = str_replace(ba_result, "  ", "")) %>%
  select(refid, arm_id, study, year, arm_n, starts_with("ind"), starts_with("ref"), ba_ind_thresh:ba_loa) %>%
  arrange(year, refid, ind_test) %>%
  left_join(study_char_ba.dat[, c("refid", "study_l")], by = c("refid")) %>%
  relocate(study_l, .after = study) %>%
  # fix Bowdle 3392 TEMPORARY fix
  group_by(refid) %>%
  mutate(
    arm_id = ifelse(refid == 3392, row_number(), arm_id)
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(
    ind_norm = ifelse(refid == 3392, "no", ind_norm),
    ref_test = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "amg", ref_test),
    ref_mon = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "TOF Watch S", ref_mon),
    ref_preload = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "no", ref_preload),
    ind_preload = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(2), NA, ind_preload),
    ref_norm = ifelse(refid == 3392, "no", ref_norm),
    ba_result = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(1), "-0.98", ba_result),
    ba_result = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(2), "-0.47", ba_result),
    ba_loa = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(1), "(-0.51 to 0.32)", ba_loa),
    ba_loa = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(2), "(-0.35 to 0.25)", ba_loa)
  )

# write.csv(bland_altman_kbl_at, file = "/Users/mgrant/Desktop/bland_altman_kbl_at1.csv")
```

```{r blandAltmanKblResult, include = TRUE, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
bland_altman_kbl_at <- bland_altman_kbl %>%
  filter(time_at == "at") %>%
  mutate(ba_result = str_replace(ba_result, "  ", "")) %>%
  select(refid, arm_id, study, year, arm_n, starts_with("ind"), starts_with("ref"), ba_ind_thresh:ba_loa) %>%
  arrange(year, refid, ind_test) %>%
  left_join(study_char_ba.dat[, c("refid", "study_l")], by = c("refid")) %>%
  relocate(study_l, .after = study) %>%
  # fix Bowdle 3392 TEMPORARY fix
  group_by(refid) %>%
  mutate(
    arm_id = ifelse(refid == 3392, row_number(), arm_id)
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(
    ind_norm = ifelse(refid == 3392, "no", ind_norm),
    ref_test = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "amg", ref_test),
    ref_mon = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "TOF Watch S", ref_mon),
    ref_preload = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "no", ref_preload),
    ind_preload = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(2), NA, ind_preload),
    ref_norm = ifelse(refid == 3392, "no", ref_norm),
    ba_result = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(1), "-9.8%", ba_result),
    ba_result = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(2), "-4.7%", ba_result),
    ba_result = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "14.9%", ba_result),
    ba_loa = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(1), "(-51.3% to 31.8%)", ba_loa),
    ba_loa = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(2), "(-34.9% to 25.2%)", ba_loa),
    ba_loa = ifelse(refid == 3392 & arm_id %in% c(3), "(-13.0% to 42.8%)", ba_loa)
  )

# write.csv(bland_altman_kbl_at, file = "/Users/mgrant/Desktop/bland_altman_kbl_at1.csv")
  
bland_altman_kbl_at %>%
  group_by(study) %>%
  mutate(
    study_l = ifelse(row_number() == 1, study_l, NA)
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(
    ind_test = factor(ind_test,
      levels = c("amg_uni", "amg_tri", "emg", "kmg", "mmg"),
      labels = c("AMG (uni)", "AMG (tri)", "EMG", "KMG", "MMG")
    ),
    ref_test = factor(ref_test,
      levels = c("amg_uni", "amg_tri", "emg", "kmg", "mmg"),
      labels = c("AMG (uni)", "AMG (tri)", "EMG", "KMG", "MMG")
    ),
    # ba_ind_thresh = ifelse(refid == 2120, "tofr9^b^", ba_ind_thresh),
    ba_ind_thresh = factor(ba_ind_thresh,
      levels = c("all_meas", "tofr_at1", "tofr_at9", "tofr_pacu", "tofr9^b^"),
      labels = c("All", "1.0", "0.9", "PACU", "0.9^b^")),
    # ref_mon = ifelse(ref_mon == "MMG", "Mechanomyograph", ref_mon),
    across(.cols = c(ind_preload, ind_norm, ref_preload, ref_norm), ~ ifelse(.x %in% "yes", "\U000D7", ifelse(.x %in% "no", "\UFFEE", .x)))
  ) %>%
  select(study_l, arm_n, ind_mon, ref_mon, ba_ind_thresh, ba_result, ba_loa) %>%
  kbl(
    booktabs = T, align = c("lrllcll"),
    col.names = c("Study^a^", "N", "  Monitor", "    Monitor", "Compared", "    Bias (95% CI)", "  Agreement")
  ) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" " = 2, "    Index" = 1, "    Reference" = 1, "       TOFR" = 1, " " = 1, "    Limits of" = 1), align = "l", line = FALSE, bold = TRUE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = opt_boot, full_width = FALSE, position = "left") %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = FALSE, html_font = opt_font, position = "left", "hover") %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = "8em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "4em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "9em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "9em") %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "6em") %>%
  column_spec(6, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(7, width = "10em") %>%
  footnote(
    general = c("MMG: mechanomyography."),
    alphabet = c("Fully paired designs."),
    general_title = "",
    footnote_as_chunk = FALSE
  )
```

```{r createStudyCharTable, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE} 
## (updated 2021/11/10 15:31) 2021/11/10 15:31 ----------------------------

Hmisc::latex(Hmisc::describe(study_char_diag.dat), file = "/Users/mgrant/Desktop/temp.tex")

study_char_table <- study_char_diag.dat %>%
  mutate(
    dates = str_c(date_start, "-", date_end),
    country = countrycode::countryname(country, destination = "iso3c"),
    low_r = noquote(if_else(non_vh_hdi == "yes", "\U2022", "", "")),
    n = n_enrolled,
    n_anal = n_analyze,
    pilot = noquote(if_else(pilot == "yes", "\U2022", "", "")),
    gen = noquote(if_else(!is.na(general), "\U2022", "", "")),
    reg = noquote(if_else(!is.na(regional), "\U2022", "", "")),
    registered = noquote(if_else(registered == "yes", "\U2022", "", ""))) %>% 
  mutate(
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ str_replace(.x, "surg_", "")),
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ str_c(.x, ", ")),
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ firstup(.x)),
    across(surg_various:surg_other, ~ replace_na(.x, "")),
    surg_list = ifelse(grepl("abdom", surg_list), "Abdominal, ", ""),
    surgs = str_c(surg_various, surg_car, surg_cr, surg_gyn, surg_gi, surg_gen, surg_headneck, surg_hep, surg_neuro, surg_opth, surg_oralmax, surg_ortho, surg_otolar, surg_plastic, surg_thor, surg_urol, surg_list),
    surgs = str_replace(surgs, "Otolar", "ENT"),
    surgs = str_replace(surgs, "Headneck", "ENT"),
    surgs = str_sub(surgs, 1, nchar(surgs) - 2)
  ) %>%
  select(refid, age, year, study, dates, country, low_r, n, centers, low_r, pilot, surgs, nct) %>% 
  arrange(age,year)



  arrange(age, desc(surg_nosurg), design, year, study) %>%
  select(refid, age, surg_nosurg, design, study, dates, country, n, pilot, setting, gen, reg, sed, surg, registered)
```
